sentences.en: A powerful one - step disinfectant cleaner for floor. Prevents mold and mildew.
sentences.cn: 一次过发挥清洁、消毒及辟味三种功能, 有助防止霉菌及细菌滋生.

sentences.en: Acrylic fibers are strong, resilient , resistant to moisture, mildew and weathering.
sentences.cn: 丙烯腈纤维强度高, 弹性好;抗湿性 、 抗霉菌性、抗风化性均较好.

sentences.en: He was already asleep in the bed, which smelled faintly of mildew.
sentences.cn: 他已经在略带霉味的床上睡着了。

sentences.en: It also inhibited the occurrence of downy mildew and Erwinia carotovora.
sentences.cn: 对田间大白菜的霜霉病、软腐病的发生具有一定抑制作用.

sentences.en: Mildew may form in this weather.
Mushrooms, toadstools and mildew are all fungi.
sentences.cn: 蘑菇 、 蕈与白霉都是菌类植物.

sentences.en: My name is mildew. My name is bog, fen, marsh and swamp.
sentences.cn: 老子还叫霉菌. 老子还叫泥巴塘子, 泥巴沼子, 黑沼泽,沼泽.

sentences.en: Pm 4 a, Pm 4 b and Pm 2 x were highly effective in mildew resistance.
sentences.cn: 据测知:Pm4a 、 Pm4b、Pm2x抗性基因在四川是高效的.

sentences.en: That can prevent problems called black spark spot and mildew.
sentences.cn: 最好在早晨浇水,这样能够避免黑斑病和霉菌.

sentences.en: The grain is liable to mildew when the humidity in the barn is too high.
sentences.cn: 仓库里潮气太大,粮食就容易发霉.

sentences.en: The interior was dark and smelled of mildew.
sentences.cn: 里面光线很暗,霉味扑鼻.

sentences.en: The main effect of element of A Ji mildew and its side - effect?
sentences.cn: 阿奇霉素的主要作用和它的副作用?

sentences.en: The outside dew point is so low that mildew is seldom a problem.
sentences.cn: 户外霜点低,因此霜霉病很少发生.

sentences.en: Thus, the Lord said: I have smitten you with blasting and mildew.
sentences.cn: 上帝这样说道: 我以旱风霉烂攻击你们.

phrases.tran_cn: 霜霉病；霜霉菌；大豆霜霉病；露菌病

trans.tran_en: a white or grey substance that grows on walls or other surfaces in wet, slightly warm conditions
a white or grey substance that grows on walls or other surfaces in wet, slightly warm conditions
